alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 10:41AM MST until January 18 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow and wind expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches, with locally higher amounts above pass level. Winds gusting as high as 45 MPH. * WHERE...The Big Hole Mountains, including but not limited to Victor and Pine Creek Pass. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 2 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
